template.name: Template SNMP VIPNET-MIB
template.description: Created By Sean Bradley's SNMP2ZABBIX.py at https://github.com/Sean-Bradley/SNMP2ZABBIX

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infNetID
item.description: An octet string containing information about the ViPNet network ID.

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infHostID
item.description: An octet string containing information about the ViPNet host ID.

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infUserID
item.description: A textual string containing information about the ViPNet current user.

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infUpTime
item.description: The value of UpTime is the time from start ViPNet till now.

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infViPnetID
item.description: An octet string containing information about the ViPNetID.

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infViPNetNetName
item.description: A string containing VipNet net name

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetHostName
item.description: A string containing VipNet host name

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfNumber
item.description: The number of network interfaces (regardless of their current state) present on this system.

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infIpJrnlMaxSize
item.description: The max size of the ip journal

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infIpJrnlTimeDiff
item.description: The ip journal records aggregation interval

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infIpJrnlRegAll
item.description: Whether all packets are registered or not

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infIpJrnlRegBrdCst
item.description: Whether broadcast packages are registered or not

item.name: VIPNET-MIB::infIpJrnlRegTcpPortSrv
item.description: For tcp connection register only server port

discovery_rule.name: VIPNET-MIB::infIpListTable
discovery_rule.description: The table contains list of the ip addresses.

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infIp[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: One of the ip address of the client.

discovery_rule.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfTable
discovery_rule.description: A list of interface entries. The number of entries is given by the value of infVipNetIfNumber.

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfDescr[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: A textual string containing information about the interface. This string should include the name of the manufacturer, the product name and the version of the interface hardware/software.

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfMode[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: The ViPNet mode of interface. See documentation of ViPNet

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfOpenIn[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Received open packets counter. See documentation of ViPNet

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfOpenInBlock[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Received open blocks counter. See documentation of ViPNet

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfOpenOut[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Sent open packets counter. See documentation of ViPNet

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfOpenOutBlock[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Sent open blocks counter. See documentation of ViPNet

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfCryptIn[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Received crypted packets counter. See documentation of ViPNet

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfCryptInBlock[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Received crypted blocks counter. See documentation of ViPNet

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfCryptOut[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Sent crypted packets counter. See documentation of ViPNet

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infVipNetIfCryptOutBlock[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Sent crypted blocks counter. See documentation of ViPNet

discovery_rule.name: VIPNET-MIB::infTaskListTable
discovery_rule.description: A task list in which agent is registered

discovery_rule.name: VIPNET-MIB::infViPNetServicesTable
discovery_rule.description: A list of the vipnet services.

item_prototype.name: VIPNET-MIB::infViPNetServiceUptime[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: The value is the time from start corresponding service till now.
